home.welcome_text: You can rank sentence examples with the following tools ...

auth.signup_cta: Please register with email and password.
auth.recover_cta: Request a new password for your Email.
auth.google_signin_cookie_warning: The Google SignIn Button will only work if 3rd party Cookies are enabled in your browser.

menu.bestworst3_text: Select the best and worst out of four example
menu.bestworst3_text2: 4 sentence examples are displayed. First mark the best sentence example. Finally, select the worst sentence example.
